channel.title: HELP!How to i play my server on my other Laptop?HELP
channel.description: The title is kind of confusing but what im trying to say is that...I want to host my server on one computer and play my server on the laptop...anyone know how i would do this?

item.title: HELP!How to i play my server on my other Laptop?HELP
item.dc:creator: @bobby11 bobby1
item.description:
@bobby11 wrote:

Sorry but im kind of confused…but this is what i had tryed ran my server…example of a ip hdhfu.no-ip.biz…(lets just say)…then i went on my laptop opened up moparscape webclient and put that ip address in because i dont got my own client yet…But that doesnt work…

Read full topic

item.title: HELP!How to i play my server on my other Laptop?HELP
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

If that doesn’t work, just run the server with no ip, and change ur client from 127.0.0.1 to your no ip address

Read full topic
item.source: HELP!How to i play my server on my other Laptop?HELP

item.title: HELP!How to i play my server on my other Laptop?HELP
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Upload the client on your computer, download it on your laptop. Run it on your computer on localhost. 127.0.01, and on your laptop and it should work.

Read full topic
